resources.string: How can we help you to lose weight?

"This is a weight loss program that incorporates HIIT exercise and nutrition diet. We will guide you day by day through the entire weight loss process and also show you how to eat to maximise fat loss.
Our HIIT exercise is a form of simple high intensity interval training which speeds up your metabolic rate and boosts your metabolism for up to 24 hours. This means you\'ll be burning fat even after you\'ve finished the run and walk.
On the other hand, our diet plan consists of lots of high fiber and protein food, which will let you eat without getting fat.
No more going hungry just to lose weight!"
Input your details to customize your training plan.
Please make sure all fields are filled before you continue.
Some of the values are not valid, please check and try again.
You had completed this run before, are you sure you want to run again?

Welcome to 30 days running weight loss! We adapt HIIT exercise method to maximize calorie burn in our running plan, which means each running involves several states, represented by different colors. The running plan will vary depending on the information you have input.
Warm up phase is represented by LIGHT ORANGE color. At this point, do some stretching and slow run as this phase is important to prevent injury.
Walk phase is represented by LIGHT GREEN color. Please walk with your normal walking speed.
Fast Walk phase is represented by DARK GREEN color. You should try to walk with your maximum possible speed during this phase.
Run phase is represented by LIGHT RED color. Run at your normal speed during this phase.
Sprint phase is represented by DARK RED color. Run with your FULL SPEED during this phase.
Cool down phase is represented by BLUE color. Gradually slow down your run/walk in this final exercise phase.
Confirm giving up on this exercise?
Calories burn by each day plan
"Are you sure you want to delete this record? Total run time and calories recorded until now will be affected."
Average Greek consumes more than 20 liters of olive oil a year - that is why the spartans look so toned! We have included it in your meal plan today, check it out!
Coffee can increase body fat burn by as much as 10% in obese individuals, but drinking too much will give you insomnia at night. Follow our meal plan today to burn fats and sleep soundly tonight!

Almonds consumed as snacks reduce hunger and desire to eat later in the day, so you never have to reach for that chocolate bar sprinkled with sugar. Almond is included in our meal plan today, check it out now.

Brown rice is an excellent source of dietary fibre as it tends to fill you up more and has been associated with decreased food intake and maintenance of a healthy body weight. Brown is the new white, so check out our brown rice meal today!

Eating chicken breast, without breading or skin, helps you to eat fewer calories and even burn extra calories for effective weight loss. Transforming yourself into the nemesis of chicken (breast) is always the first step to shape your body to something other than round. Check out our chicken breast meal plan for today.

Broccoli is high in fiber, which aids in digestion, prevents constipation and lowers blood sugar. Now you know why your mother insists on you finishing your broccoli! Check out this vegetable in our meal plan today.
This apple is not the apple (phone) you want, but the apple you need. Check out our meal plan today for much needed apple meal!
Whole eggs are among the most nutritious foods on the planet, containing a little bit of almost every nutrient we need. Not too eggciting huh, come check out our more eggciting meal plan today!

Mushrooms are the only fiber source of vitamin D. It is also low in glycemic index which means it will make you feel fuller for longer time. Super Mario\'s favourite. Check out our dish cooked with mushroom today.

Spinach helps you to lose weight because they\'re low in calories but nutrient-dense. Although Popeye would have you believe it will bulk you up, spinach is actually the key to keep you slim. Check out our meal with spinach today.
According to the study, a daily glass of tomato juice can help to trim your waistline. We have included it in our meal plan today so enjoy some vegetable blood equivalent!
Banana is effective in curbing your appetite and controlling the increased blood sugar levels in the body. Just watch out for the wild monkeys. Check out our meal plan today with banana.

A serving of potato contains only just 110 calories, with zero fat as well as zero cholesterol. Thus, eating potato will actually make you shaping less like a potato. Tap to check out our potato meal plan today.

Salmon oil can help to lower triglycerides in the blood and, therefore, reduce the amount of stored fat in your body. Don\'t like eating fish oil supplement though? Come check out our real tasty salmon meal today.

Papaya is known for its low fat and cholesterol free content. It also helps to enhance your digestive system and relieve constipation. It will be so fast that your colleague won\'t even notice you have gone to the toilet, if you know what I mean. Come check out our meal plan with papaya today.

The body digests oatmeal at a slower pace, helping to keep blood sugar levels steady, energy up, and hunger away. Perfect for you who are forever 18, of course! Tap to see how to have a tasty oatmeal diet.
Strawberry contains Anthocyanins which stimulates your metabolism and suppresses your appetite. What do you call a sad strawberry? Check out our meal plan for the answer!

Eating a diet rich in walnuts can lead to the same amount of weight loss as a lower fat, higher carbohydrate diet. Walnuts are also rich in polyunsaturated fats, which help to maintain heart health and lower cholesterol. So remember to buy some Walnuts when you pass by Walmart, puns really not intended. Check out our meal plan today which included walnuts.

Green tea, is packed with catechins, which help to promote weight loss by boosting your body\'s ability to metabolise fats. Get that green tea to start burning that fat! Remember to check out today meal plan with green tea today.

Carrots are mostly water and fiber to keep you hydrated and yet full. You\'ll also get essential nutrients, such as vitamins A and K. Learn from the bunny and eat some carrots. Check out our meal plan today with carrots.

As a natural diuretic, asparagus helps to flush out excess liquid and combat belly bulge. Keep going and you will eventually become as slim as an asparagus. Tap to see your meal plan today with asparagus.

Red peppers contain a molecule called capsaicin that is shown to increase your fat-burning rate and promote weight loss, also, (rrriiinnnggg.....) oops time to have some "bell" peppers, come check out our meal plan today

Avocados tend to be high in fiber, about 7% by weight, which is very high compared to most other foods. Fiber can have various important benefits for weight loss and metabolic health. It also certainly has a crush on guacamole. Come check out our diet plan with avocado today.
Adding green beans to the diet ensures a healthy supply of important nutrients without any extra calories. Also Mr Bean is funny. Tap to view our meal plan today with beans.

Lettuce has only 12 calories for one shredded cup and zero fat which make it a particularly effective diet food. The nickname of perfect weight loss food is not for nothing. Come check out our meal plan with lettuce today.

Free radicals contribute to your body\'s aging process. The high levels of antioxidants found in oranges help to reduce damage to your skin caused by high levels of free radicals. A diet rich in oranges can thus result in fewer wrinkles and healthier-looking skin as you age. You want to slim down as well as looking young at the same time, don\'t you? Come check out today meal plan.

Greek yogurt can keep you fortified with essential nutrients and even help you to lose weight. It has thicker texture with fewer carbohydrates and sugar, and more protein than regular yogurt. It is also not only sold in Greece. Check out our meal plan today on when is the best time to have greek yogurt.

Celery is extremely low in calories and can be a valuable food to help you to lose weight because of its ability to provide vital nutrients and to help regulate fat metabolism. Add plenty of orange to its juice form though if you can’t stand its unique taste. Come check out our meal plan how we make celery taste good today.
Prawn has no guts, no spine and a head full of shit, but calorie count wise it is the fairest among them all meats. Come check out our meal plan with prawn today.
Garlic is a powerful detoxifier. It boosts your metabolism and eliminates fat from the cells. But try to avoid kissing somebody right after having it. Come check out our meal plan with garlic today.
You cannot expect to achieve new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.
Those who think they have no time for bodily exercise will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow.
You will never change your life until you change something you do daily.
A strong positive attitude will create more miracles than any wonder drug.
Progress is impossible without change and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
Failure is not fatal. Only failure to get back up is.
You don’t drown by falling in the water. You drown by staying there.
It’s in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
Most people fail, not because of lack of desire, but, because of lack of commitment.
The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking places.
People may doubt what you say, but they will believe what you do.
Movement is a medicine for creating change in a person’s physical, emotional, and mental states.
Mental will is a muscle that needs exercise, just like the muscles of the body.
Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
A goal without a plan is just a wish.
If you want to accomplish anything in life, you can’t just sit back and hope it will happen. You’ve got to make it happen.
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Nothing worthwhile comes easily. Work, continuous work and hard work, is the only way to accomplish results that last.
The only thing that ever sat its way to success was a hen.
There are only two options regarding commitment; you’re either in or you’re out. There’s no such thing as life in-between.
Our health always seems much more valuable after we lose it.
Nothing will work unless you do.
No matter who you are, no matter what you do, you absolutely, positively do have the power to change.
People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing – that’s why we recommend it daily.
Put all excuses aside and remember this: YOU are capable.
Whenever you do a thing, act as if all the world were watching.
You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
The future is always beginning now.

You SHOULD NOT add sugar to your tea and coffee within 30 days!
Always remember to remove skin and fat from the meat
Take one tablespoon of extra virgin olive oil in the morning helps with weight loss
Cook with olive oil when you\'re trying to grill the food
Sugar is the main cause of obesity
Avoid salty food, it will makes your body bloated
Drink more water can boost your metabolism to burn fat
Caffeine in coffee and tea can boost metabolism, drink 1 to 2 cup everyday to speed up your weight loss progress
You are what you eat, so choose your food wisely
Get a good night’s sleep, every night. Poor sleep is one of the strongest risk factors for weight gain
Stress may increase levels of stress hormones in your body, this can cause increased hunger and result in weight gain
Fast eaters gain more weight over time. Eating slowly makes you feel more full and boosts weight-reducing hormones
Eat spicy food, it can actually help you cut back on calories
Sugar-free product often contain unhealthy sugar alternatives
Always prepare food by yourself so you\'ll know what you\'re eating
Snack on a small handful of nuts helps stave off hunger and keeps your metabolism stoked
Always choose whole-grain for the carb
An extra tablespoon of salad dressing can add 75 to 100 calories
Breakfast skippers weigh more than breakfast eaters
Think about your waistline before ordering those extra fries.
Try to get out of the habit of always eating something while you are sitting and relaxing,
If you replace a 20oz bottle of soda with water daily, you would easily lose up to 35 pounds in one year
Eat more vegetables, it contains a lot of fibers that help with weight loss
Beer contains rapidly digested carbs that shut down fat burning
Stop eating potato chips, popcorn, cookies, candy, ice cream, cakes
Avoid fast food, most of them are unhealthy and contain lots of calories
Exercise to lose weight, not via medication!
If you return to living exactly the way you did when you are obese, don’t be surprised when the excess weight returns. It will
Weight loss effect doesn\'t last forever unless you get rid of the bad habit
Always remind yourself how hard you have worked to come this far
